meanings.definition: The occasion of a person's birth.
meanings.sent1: The nativity of the baby brought joy to the family.
meanings.sent2: Every person celebrates their own nativity with family and friends.
meanings.sent3: The nativity of the new puppy was a surprise to everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her nativity was like a fresh start in life, full of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The nativity of a new idea can lead to great discoveries.

meanings.sent1: Christians around the world celebrate the nativity of Jesus on Christmas.
meanings.sent2: The nativity scene depicts the birth of Jesus in a manger.
meanings.sent3: The nativity play at school was a heartwarming event.
meanings.sent4: The nativity story is a timeless tale of hope and love.
meanings.sent5: The nativity of Jesus is a central theme in Christian faith.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being born.
meanings.sent1: The nativity of the foal was a beautiful sight in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The nativity of a new star marks the beginning of its life cycle.
meanings.sent3: The nativity of a rainbow after the storm brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The nativity of spring brings new life to the barren trees.
meanings.sent5: The nativity of a butterfly emerging from its chrysalis is a magical moment.
